attributes.action: Drop fuel duty by at least 5-10p per litre
attributes.additional_details:
With the price of fuel dropping due to a decrease in the cost of a barrel of oil, isn't it time the government dropped fuel duty as it is now at around 70% the cost per litre.

We have been taxed more than enough for having cars over the years so let's all join together and get the government to help us all out with fuel prices. The more signatures we get the more chance we have of this happening.

Come on UK let's show our government we have a voice and what we want!!
